content:
[Multi | Single] Check [In | Out]

  • Requirements

    • Intent to Edit
    • Independent of other Actions

  • Suggested Implementation - New Method

Previous slide Next slide Back to first slide View graphic version

Notes:

    Check In and Check Out indicates an intent to edit. However there are additional constraints such as if multiple check outs are allowed that are server dependent and we should provide a means for the user to specify their meaning on a URL by URL basis.
    In any case Check In and Check Out should be performed independently of any other action. This functionality can be provided either through new headers or a new method.
